001package imagingbook.pub.regions.segment;
002
003import java.awt.Rectangle;
004import java.util.Formatter;
005import java.util.Iterator;
006import java.util.LinkedList;
007import java.util.List;
008import java.util.Locale;
009import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
010
011import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
012import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d.PntInt;
013import imagingbook.pub.regions.BinaryRegion;
014import imagingbook.pub.regions.Contour;
015
016/**
017 * Binary region backed by the label array of a region segmenter.
018 */
019public class SegmentationBackedRegion extends BinaryRegion {
020
021        private final int label;                                                                        // the label of this region
022        private final BinaryRegionSegmentation segmentation;            // the segmentation backing this region
023        private int size = 0;
024        private double xc = Double.NaN;
025        private double yc = Double.NaN;
026        private int left = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
027        private int right = -1;
028        private int top = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
029        private int bottom = -1;
030
031        private Contour outerContour = null;
032        private List<Contour> innerContours = null;
033
034        // summation variables used for various statistics
035        private long x1Sum = 0;
036        private long y1Sum = 0;
037        private long x2Sum = 0;
038        private long y2Sum = 0;
039        private long xySum = 0;
040
041        // ------- constructor --------------------------
042
043        SegmentationBackedRegion(int label, BinaryRegionSegmentation seg) {
044                this.label = label;
045                this.segmentation = seg;
046        }
047
048        // ------- public methods --------------------------
049
050        protected int getLabel() {
051                return this.label;
052        }
053
054        @Override
055        public int getSize() {
056                return this.size;
057        }
058        
059        @Override
060        public long getX1Sum() {
061                return x1Sum;
062        }
063
064        @Override
065        public long getY1Sum() {
066                return y1Sum;
067        }
068
069        @Override
070        public long getX2Sum() {
071                return x2Sum;
072        }
073
074        @Override
075        public long getY2Sum() {
076                return y2Sum;
077        }
078
079        @Override
080        public long getXYSum() {
081                return xySum;
082        }
083
084        /**
085         * Get the x/y axes-parallel bounding box as a rectangle
086         * (including the extremal coordinates).
087         * @return the bounding box rectangle.
088         */
089        @Override
090        public Rectangle getBoundingBox() {
091                if (right < 0)
092                        return null;
093                else
094                        return new Rectangle(left, top, right-left + 1, bottom - top + 1);
095        }
096
097        @Override
098        public Iterator<Pnt2d> iterator() {
099                return new RegionPixelIterator();
100        }
101
102        /**
103         * Adds a single pixel to this region and updates summation
104         * and boundary variables used to calculate various region statistics.
105         * 
106         * @param u x-position
107         * @param v y-position
108         */
109        protected void addPixel(int u, int v) {
110                size = size + 1;
111                x1Sum = x1Sum + u;
112                y1Sum = y1Sum + v;
113                x2Sum = x2Sum + u * u;
114                y2Sum = y2Sum + v * v;
115                xySum = xySum + u * v;
116                if (u < left)   left = u;
117                if (v < top)    top = v;
118                if (u > right)  right = u;
119                if (v > bottom) bottom = v;
120        }
121
122        /**
123         * Updates the region's statistics. 
124         * Does nothing but may be overridden by inheriting classes.
125         */
126        protected void update() {
127        }
128
129        /**
130         * Get the (single) outer contour of this region.
131         * Points on an outer contour are arranged in clockwise
132         * order.
133         * @return the outer contour.
134         */
135        @Override
136        public Contour getOuterContour() {
137                return outerContour;
138        }
139
140        public void setOuterContour(Contour.Outer contr) {
141                outerContour = contr;
142        }
143
144        /**
145         * Get all inner contours of this region.
146         * Points on inner contours are arranged in counter-clockwise order.
147         * @return the list of inner contours.
148         */
149        @Override
150        public List<Contour> getInnerContours() {       // sort!!!
151                return innerContours;
152        }
153
154        public void addInnerContour(Contour.Inner contr) {
155                if (innerContours == null) {
156                        innerContours = new LinkedList<>();
157                }
158                innerContours.add(contr);
159        }
160
161        //              // Compare method for sorting by region size (larger regions at front)
162        //              @Override
163        //              public int compareTo(SegmentationBackedRegion r2) {
164        //                      return r2.size - this.size;
165        //              }
166
167        /**
168         * Checks if the given pixel position is contained in this
169         * {@link SegmentationBackedRegion} instance.
170         * @param u x-coordinate
171         * @param v y-coordinate
172         * @return true if (u,v) is contained in this region
173         */
174        @Override
175        public boolean contains(int u, int v) {
176                return segmentation.getLabel(u, v) == this.label;
177        }
178        
179        @Override
180        public String toString() {
181                Formatter fm = new Formatter(new StringBuilder(), Locale.US);
182                fm.format("Region %d", label);
183                fm.format(", area = %d", size);
184                fm.format(", bounding box = (%d, %d, %d, %d)", left, top, right, bottom );
185                fm.format(", centroid = (%.2f, %.2f)", xc, yc);
186                if (innerContours != null)
187                        fm.format(", holes = %d", innerContours.size());
188                String s = fm.toString();
189                fm.close();
190                return s;
191        }
192
193        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
194
195        /**
196         * Instances of this class are returned by {@link SegmentationBackedRegion#iterator()},
197         * which implements  {@link Iterable} for instances of class {@link Pnt2d}.
198         */
199        private class RegionPixelIterator implements Iterator<Pnt2d> {
200                private final int label;                                        // the corresponding region's label
201                private final int uMin, uMax, vMin, vMax;       // coordinates of region's bounding box
202                private int uCur, vCur;                                         // current pixel position
203                private PntInt pNext;                                           // coordinates of the next region pixel
204                private boolean first;                                          // control flag
205
206                RegionPixelIterator() {
207                        label = SegmentationBackedRegion.this.getLabel();
208                        Rectangle bb = SegmentationBackedRegion.this.getBoundingBox();
209                        first = true;
210                        uMin = bb.x;
211                        uMax = bb.x + bb.width;
212                        vMin = bb.y;
213                        vMax = bb.y + bb.height;
214                        uCur = uMin;
215                        vCur = vMin;
216                        pNext = null;
217                }
218
219                /** 
220                 * Search from position (uCur, vCur) for the next valid region pixel.
221                 * Return the next position as a Point or null if no such point can be found.
222                 * Don't assume that (uCur, vCur) is a valid region pixel!
223                 * 
224                 * @return the next point
225                 */
226                private Pnt2d.PntInt findNext() {
227                        // start search for next region pixel at (u,v):
228                        int u = (first) ? uCur : uCur + 1;
229                        int v = vCur;
230                        first = false;
231                        while (v <= vMax) {
232                                while (u <= uMax) {
233                                        if (segmentation.getLabel(u, v) == label) { // next pixel found (uses surrounding labeling)
234                                                uCur = u;
235                                                vCur = v;
236                                                return PntInt.from(uCur, vCur);
237                                        }
238                                        u++;
239                                }
240                                v++;
241                                u = uMin;
242                        }
243                        uCur = uMax + 1;        // just to make sure we'll never enter the loop again
244                        vCur = vMax + 1;
245                        return null;            // no next pixel found
246                }
247
248                @Override
249                public boolean hasNext() {
250                        if (pNext != null) {    // next element has been queried before but not consumed
251                                return true;
252                        }
253                        else {
254                                pNext = findNext();     // keep next pixel coordinates in pNext
255                                return (pNext != null);
256                        }
257                }
258
259                // Returns: the next element in the iteration
260                // Throws: NoSuchElementException - if the iteration has no more elements.
261                @Override
262                public PntInt next() {
263                        if (pNext != null || hasNext()) {
264                                PntInt pn = pNext;
265                                pNext = null;           // "consume" pNext
266                                return pn;
267                        }
268                        else {
269                                throw new NoSuchElementException();
270                        }
271                }
272
273                @Override
274                public void remove() {
275                        throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
276                }
277
278        } // end of class RegionPixelIterator
279
280} // end of class BinaryRegion
